organic.title: Chronic Pain Management & Treatment | Pain.com
organic.snippet: Find personalized pain relief for chronic pain. Explore the latest tools and resources to help you discover the right solution for treating and managing ...

organic.title: U.S. Pain Foundation - serving patients with chronic pain
organic.snippet: US Pain Foundation is a 501 (c)(3) nonprofit organization dedicated to serving those who live with conditions that cause chronic pain.

organic.title: American Chronic Pain Association
organic.snippet: The ACPA is a non-profit, 501(c) (3) organization. Our Mission is to facilitate peer support, education, hope, and motivation for individuals living with pain.

organic.title: Intractable or chronic pain: there is a difference - PMC
organic.snippet: When this definition is used, more than 40% of the general population reports having chronic pain, primarily due to arthritis or other musculoskeletal disorder.

organic.title: Intractable Pain: Symptoms, Causes, and Treatments - Healthline
organic.snippet: Intractable pain refers to a type of pain that can't be controlled with standard medical care. Intractable essentially means difficult to treat or manage.
